name: Christmasjong
description:
Feel the atmosphere of Christmas with Christmasjong, a great Mahjong game with beautiful Chrsitmas theme Mahjong tiles. Customize everything you need! Set the background, the color and shape of tiles and many things more. Choose whatever mode you like: Classic or Match. Each level is more fun than the last, so get ready to spend time in a cozy Christmas atmosphere!

* 120 levels of mahjong fun
* Classic and match mode
* Fantastic soundtrack
* Christmas animated backgrounds
